metadata.title: RHSA-2017:0257: ovirt-engine-extension-aaa-jdbc security update (Important)
metadata.description:
AAA-JDBC is an extension which allows to store authentication and authorization data in relational database and provides these data using standardized oVirt AAA API similarly to already existing AAA-LDAP extension.

Security Fix(es):

* When updating a password in the rhvm database the ovirt-aaa-jdbc-tool tools fail to correctly check for the current password if it is expired. This would allow access to an attacker with access to change the password on accounts with expired passwords, gaining access to those accounts. (CVE-2017-2614)

This issue was discovered by Dominic Geevarghes (Red Hat).

bugzilla.text: CVE-2017-2614 rhev-m-4: Fails to validate existing expired passwords when changing a password

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
ovirt-engine-extension-aaa-jdbc is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
